summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Opening Trainer (Phase 2) feature. All backend APIs (12 tests) passed and all frontend features working correctly.

backend_api_openings_database.description: Returns list of 6 openings (Italian Game, Sicilian Defense, Caro-Kann, French Defense, Queen's Gambit, London System) with correct variations and traps counts

backend_api_openings_stats.description: Returns user's most played openings with mastery levels (learning, needs_work, comfortable, mastered)

backend_api_opening_content.description: Returns training content including key ideas, variations, traps, typical mistakes, and user's mistakes

backend_api_opening_quiz.description: Returns quiz questions for opening knowledge testing

frontend_opening_trainer_tab.description: Opening Trainer tab appears in Training page alongside Puzzles tab

frontend_tree_view_sections.description: Tree view shows 'Your Repertoire' (10 openings from user games) and 'Opening Library' (6 reference openings) sections with correct counts

frontend_opening_content_panel.description: Clicking an opening displays content on right panel with: name, ECO code, description, main line, key ideas, key variations (3), traps to know

frontend_board_display.description: Board displays the opening's main line position correctly (verified Italian Game with Bc4)

frontend_trap_practice_mode.description: Clicking 'Practice' on a trap enters practice mode with: position display, move sequence (Ng5, d5, exd5, Nxd5, Nxf7), Reset/Start/Next Move controls, explanation text, Back button

critical_code_review_comments: opening_trainer_service.py: Well-structured opening database with 6 openings covering main e4 and d4 responses
OpeningTrainer.jsx: Clean component with proper state management for tree expansion, practice mode, and board display
TrainingNew.jsx: Good integration of OpeningTrainer component within Tabs structure
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
test_credentials: Dev Login button on landing page, or session_token=test_session_356539ff12b1
seed_data_creation: None required - backend has built-in opening database
context_for_next_testing_agent: Opening Trainer Phase 2 fully functional. Backend endpoints at /api/training/openings-database, /api/training/openings/stats, /api/training/openings/{key}, /api/training/openings/{key}/quiz. Frontend component at OpeningTrainer.jsx integrated into TrainingNew.jsx with Tabs. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_opening_trainer.py for regression testing.
